snippet: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi noted Alex Rodriguez’s progress but was still unable to speak confidently about his return from hip surgery.
lead_paragraph: Yankees Manager Joe Girardi noted Alex Rodriguez’s progress but was still unable to speak confidently about his return from hip surgery.

headline.main: Rodriguez Runs at Three-Quarters Speed but Has Yet to Outrun Uncertainty
headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Runs at Three-Quarters Speed but Has Yet to Outrun Uncertainty
